name: Solitaire Puno
description:
This is a new Card game created by Young Stars, the creator of "Toy Blast Mania" and "Jelly Blast Legend" games!

The World's #1 Card Game Solitaire FREE on Android!

Solitaire Puno is also known as Klondike Solitaire and Patience or windows solitaire, and it is the most popular free solitaire card game in the world. The goal of the classic solitaire game is to place all cards to four foundations (one for each suit) in ascending order.

SOLITAIRE PUNO FEATURES:

FEATURES
• Two game modes: Arcade and Classic
• There are two easy and difficult levels: draw 1 card (easy) and draw 3 cards (hard)
• Simple tap-to-play or drag-and-drop card movement
• Awesome HD graphics
• Unlimited free undo
• Unlimited free hints
• Skip and go to next level
• All Winning deals
• Choose your card style
• Winning classic animations
• Offline play and solitaire no ad when offline play
• Phone and Tablet support

****************************************************************************************
Download Solitaire Puno now to start your saga! Enjoy!
***************************************************************************
